desc.cn: Weave Gitops 是 Flux 的强大扩展，这是领先的 Gitops Engine and CNCF 项目
desc.en: Weave GitOps is a powerful extension to Flux, a leading GitOps engine and CNCF project

/curl.cmd:
curl --silent --location "https://github.com/weaveworks/weave-gitops/releases/download/v0.38.0/gitops-$(uname)-$(uname -m).tar.gz" | tar xz -C /tmp \
&& sudo mv /tmp/gitops /usr/local/bin \
&& gitops version

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap weaveworks/tap \
&& brew install weaveworks/tap/gitops
